ingredients: 4 large dried black mushrooms, soaked in hot water to cover for 25 minutes and drained
1/2 lb. coarsely ground fat pork, such as pork butt
6 oz. shrimp meat or crabmeat, finely chopped
2 green onions, white and light green portions, finely chopped
1 Tbs. vegetable or peanut oil, or 1 1/2 tsp. each vegetable oil and sesame oil
1 Tbs. vegetable or peanut oil, or 1 1/2 tsp. each vegetable oil and sesame oil
1 Tbs. vegetable or peanut oil, or 1 1/2 tsp. each vegetable oil and sesame oil
Light soy sauce, mild mustard or chili sauce for dipping
Light soy sauce, mild mustard or chili sauce for dipping
